name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in full-stack development. Proficient in **C#.NET**, leveraging **SQL** for robust database management and **Docker** for containerization in multithreaded applications. Skilled in modern software practices including **TDD** and **BDD**, ensuring code quality and performance. Adept in using **Git** for version control and collaboration across teams. Experienced in distributed services architecture and proficient in **Linux** environments, alongside familiarity with tools like **Team City** for CI/CD automation. 

My previous roles include developing high-performance solutions for the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python** frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. I have successfully integrated voice technologies including **VoIP** and **PBX** systems, applying knowledge of **SIP** and **RTP** protocols. I also bring expertise in cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**, and have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms implementing AI/ML capabilities for real-time data processing and predictive analytics.
